fruits.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
fruits.description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber. Immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

abilities.name: Gum-Gum Pistol
abilities.description: Stretch arm for a powerful punch

fruits.name: Bara Bara no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to split their body into pieces and control them independently. Immune to slashing attacks.

fruits.name: Ope Ope no Mi
fruits.description: Creates a spherical domain where user can manipulate anything. Can perform miraculous surgeries.

abilities.name: Room
abilities.description: Create spherical operating room for manipulation

abilities.name: Shambles
abilities.description: Swap positions of objects within ROOM

abilities.name: Gamma Knife
abilities.description: Destroy internal organs without external wounds

weaknesses: High stamina cost for large ROOMs
strengths: Can grant immortality (at cost of user's life)

mastery_bonuses.level_5: Can use multiple techniques in succession

fruits.name: Gura Gura no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create devastating earthquakes and shockwaves. Called the strongest Paramecia.

abilities.name: Shima Yurashi
abilities.description: Tilt entire battlefield with massive quake

fruits.name: Mero Mero no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn those attracted to them into stone. Can shoot love-based beams.

abilities.name: Mero Mero Mellow
abilities.description: Heart-shaped beam that petrifies attracted enemies

fruits.name: Doku Doku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to generate and control various types of poison. Immune to all toxins.

abilities.name: Hydra
abilities.description: Create poison dragon heads to attack

special_mechanics.poison_varieties: multiple types from mild to deadly

fruits.name: Horo Horo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control ghosts that drain willpower and create negativity.

abilities.name: Negative Hollow
abilities.description: Send ghosts that make enemies extremely negative

abilities.name: Kamikaze Raptor
abilities.description: Create explosive ghost that detonates on contact

fruits.name: Nikyu Nikyu no Mi
fruits.description: Grants paw pads that can repel anything including air, attacks, and even abstract concepts like pain.

abilities.name: Pad Cannon
abilities.description: Repel air at light speed creating devastating shockwave

abilities.name: Ursus Shock
abilities.description: Compress massive amount of air and release as giant paw-shaped shockwave

fruits.name: Hobi Hobi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn people into toys and erase memories of them. User stops aging.

abilities.name: Toy Transformation
abilities.description: Turn touched enemy into toy, erasing memories

fruits.name: Ito Ito no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control razor-sharp strings for offense, defense, and manipulation.

abilities.name: Five Color Strings
abilities.description: Slash enemies with five sharp string whips

abilities.name: Bird Cage
abilities.description: Create inescapable cage of strings that slowly shrinks

fruits.name: Bari Bari no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create indestructible barriers of various shapes and sizes.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: Create indestructible barrier to block attacks

abilities.name: Barrier Crash
abilities.description: Push barrier forward to crush enemies

weaknesses: Can't protect from all directions at once

fruits.name: Mochi Mochi no Mi
fruits.description: Special Paramecia that functions like Logia. User can create, control, and become mochi.

abilities.name: Muso Donuts
abilities.description: Create mochi donuts that launch giant mochi fists

abilities.name: Zan Giri Mochi
abilities.description: Harden mochi arm into spiked mace for devastating attack

fruits.name: Sube Sube no Mi
fruits.description: Makes the user's skin perfectly smooth, causing everything to slip off. Grants beauty and slipperiness.

fruits.name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to make any part of their body explode and regenerate. Immune to explosions.

fruits.name: Kilo Kilo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to change their weight from 1 to 10,000 kilograms at will.

abilities.name: 10,000 Kilo Press
abilities.description: Increase weight to maximum and crush enemies

fruits.name: Hana Hana no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to sprout copies of their body parts on any surface.
weaknesses: Damage to sprouted parts = damage to user

fruits.name: Doru Doru no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control wax. Wax can be harder than steel when hardened.

fruits.name: Baku Baku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to eat anything and transform into it or combine consumed objects.

abilities.name: Baku Baku Factory
abilities.description: Consume objects and transform body into them

fruits.name: Mane Mane no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to transform into a perfect copy of anyone they touch, including memories of their abilities.

fruits.name: Supa Supa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn any part of their body into steel blades. Body becomes steel.

abilities.name: Spiral Hollow
abilities.description: Spin body blades to create devastating drilling attack

fruits.name: Toge Toge no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to grow spikes from any part of their body.

fruits.name: Ori Ori no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to bind and shackle opponents by passing through them.

abilities.name: Binding Net
abilities.description: Pass through enemies to bind them

weaknesses: Strong physical force can break bindings

fruits.name: Bane Bane no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn body parts into springs for enhanced mobility and attacks.

abilities.name: Spring Hopper
abilities.description: Jump to extreme heights with spring legs

fruits.name: Noro Noro no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to emit beams that slow down anything for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Noro Noro Beam
abilities.description: Emit beam that slows enemy movement

abilities.name: Noro Noro Beam Sword
abilities.description: Concentrated slow beam for intense slowdown

fruits.name: Doa Doa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create doors on any surface, including air, for travel and attack.

abilities.name: Air Door
abilities.description: Create door in air for instant travel

abilities.name: Revolving Door
abilities.description: Create door on enemy to access their body

fruits.name: Awa Awa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control soap bubbles that can clean anything, including strength.

abilities.name: Soap Sheep
abilities.description: Create soap bubbles that wash away enemy power

abilities.name: Relaxation Foam
abilities.description: Wash away all strength and will to fight

mastery_bonuses.level_7: Wash away Devil Fruit effects temporarily

fruits.name: Beri Beri no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to split body into grape-like spherical segments.

abilities.name: Beri Beri Bomber
abilities.description: Split into berry spheres and attack

fruits.name: Shari Shari no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn body parts into wheels for enhanced speed and attacks.

abilities.name: Wheel Charge
abilities.description: Transform limbs into wheels for high-speed attacks

fruits.name: Kage Kage no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to control shadows, steal them, and create zombie armies.

abilities.name: Shadows Asgard
abilities.description: Absorb 1000 shadows for massive power boost

fruits.name: Yomi Yomi no Mi
fruits.description: Grants a second life. After awakening, can use soul energy and see through walls.

fruits.name: Suke Suke no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to become invisible and make anything they touch invisible.

abilities.name: Invisible Assault
abilities.description: Attack while invisible for guaranteed surprise

fruits.name: Kuma Kuma no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to absorb and release shockwaves through bear paw pads.

fruits.name: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to levitate themselves and non-living objects they touch.

abilities.name: Lion's Menace
abilities.description: Levitate and control massive objects as weapons

abilities.name: Sky Island
abilities.description: Lift entire islands into the sky

fruits.name: Woshu Woshu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to wash and hang anything to dry, including people and their evil hearts.

fruits.name: Shiro Shiro no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to become a living fortress. Can store armies and weapons inside body.

abilities.name: Army Inside Me
abilities.description: Deploy stored army from body castle

fruits.name: Pamu Pamu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to cause anything they touch to rupture and explode, including their own body.

abilities.name: Puncture Kill
abilities.description: Detonate own arm for devastating explosion

fruits.name: Guru Guru no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn any part of their body into a propeller for flight and attacks.

abilities.name: Propeller Drill
abilities.description: Spin body part as propeller drill

fruits.name: Buki Buki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to transform any part of their body into any weapon.

abilities.name: Full Arsenal
abilities.description: Transform entire body into weapons arsenal

fruits.name: Beta Beta no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control an incredibly sticky mucus.

abilities.name: Sticky Launcher
abilities.description: Launch sticky mucus to trap enemies

fruits.name: Giro Giro no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to see through everything, read minds, and see into the future.

abilities.name: Peep Tears
abilities.description: See through all defenses and illusions

fruits.name: Ato Ato no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to transform people and objects into abstract art.

fruits.name: Jake Jake no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to become a jacket and control whoever wears them.

abilities.name: Jacket Control
abilities.description: Transform into jacket and control wearer

fruits.name: Sui Sui no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to swim through solid surfaces as if they were water.

fruits.name: Ton Ton no Mi
fruits.description: Superior version of Kilo Kilo. Allows user to change weight from 1 to 10,000 tons.

abilities.name: 10,000 Ton Guillotine
abilities.description: Increase to maximum tonnage and drop on enemy

fruits.name: Hiso Hiso no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to communicate with and command animals.

fruits.name: Kachi Kachi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to harden their body to extreme levels and heat it up.

abilities.name: Heat Up
abilities.description: Heat hardened body to burning temperatures

fruits.name: Nemu Nemu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to put enemies to sleep and enter their dreams.

abilities.name: Sleep Mist
abilities.description: Emit mist that causes instant sleep

fruits.name: Mini Mini no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to shrink themselves and others to tiny sizes.

abilities.name: Miniaturization
abilities.description: Shrink to tiny size for stealth and evasion

fruits.name: Atsu Atsu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to generate and control extreme heat from their body.

fruits.name: Kuku Kuku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to transform enemies and objects into food.

abilities.name: Gourmet Menu
abilities.description: Transform multiple enemies into elaborate dishes

fruits.name: Gocha Gocha no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to merge with other people and objects to gain their abilities.

abilities.name: Fusion
abilities.description: Merge with ally or object to combine powers

fruits.name: Chiyu Chiyu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to heal any injury instantly by manipulating bodies like toys.

fruits.name: Soru Soru no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to extract and manipulate souls, giving life to objects and stealing lifespan.

abilities.name: Homie Creation
abilities.description: Give life to objects using souls

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Incarnation of Death - absolute soul control

fruits.name: Mira Mira no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control mirrors, travel through them, and create reflections.

abilities.name: Mirror World
abilities.description: Enter mirror dimension for travel and hiding

abilities.name: Mirror Clone
abilities.description: Create perfect copy of enemy from mirror

fruits.name: Bisu Bisu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to generate and control biscuits harder than steel.

abilities.name: Biscuit Soldiers
abilities.description: Create steel-hard biscuit soldiers to fight

abilities.name: Pretzel Roll
abilities.description: Create massive biscuit sword for devastating attacks

fruits.name: Pero Pero no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to generate and control infinite candy.

fruits.name: Shibo Shibo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to wring out liquids from any object or person.

fruits.name: Memo Memo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate memories of anyone they touch.

abilities.name: Memory Extraction
abilities.description: Extract and view memories from target

fruits.name: Juku Juku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to age or de-age anything they touch.

abilities.name: Aging Touch
abilities.description: Rapidly age touched object or person

fruits.name: Maki Maki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create scrolls that can store and release anything.

abilities.name: Scroll Storage
abilities.description: Store objects and attacks in scrolls

fruits.name: Toki Toki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to send themselves and others forward in time.

fruits.name: Hoya Hoya no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to summon and control a genie that grants wishes.

abilities.name: Genie Summon
abilities.description: Summon genie to grant combat wishes

fruits.name: Netsu Netsu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate heat, raising or lowering temperature of anything.

abilities.name: Heat Manipulation
abilities.description: Superheat or freeze objects and enemies

fruits.name: Kibi Kibi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create dango that tames animals who eat them.

abilities.name: Dango Taming
abilities.description: Feed dango to animals to make them allies

fruits.name: Oshi Oshi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to push through any obstacle and terrain.

fruits.name: Jiki Jiki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to control magnetism and manipulate metal.

fruits.name: Nagi Nagi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create soundproof barriers and silence all sounds.

abilities.name: Silent Zone
abilities.description: Create area where no sound can exist

fruits.name: Ame Ame no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control various types of candy syrup.

abilities.name: Syrup Trap
abilities.description: Create sticky syrup to trap enemies

fruits.name: Gasha Gasha no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to merge with and control any inorganic object.

abilities.name: Object Fusion
abilities.description: Merge with objects to gain their properties

abilities.name: Construct Creation
abilities.description: Combine multiple objects into powerful constructs

fruits.name: Uta Uta no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to trap people in an alternate dimension through song.

fruits.name: Zushi Zushi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to control gravity at will.

fruits.name: Horu Horu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control hormones to alter bodies and minds.

abilities.name: Emporio Healing Hormone
abilities.description: Inject hormones to heal and energize

fruits.name: Choki Choki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn hands into scissors and cut anything like paper.

abilities.name: Scissor Hands
abilities.description: Cut through anything as if it were paper

fruits.name: Gutsu Gutsu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to melt and combine objects in their body like a furnace.

abilities.name: Body Furnace
abilities.description: Melt objects in body and reform them

fruits.name: Poke Poke no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create pockets on any surface for storage.

fruits.name: Mogu Mogu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to transform into a mole-human hybrid and burrow underground.

abilities.name: Underground Travel
abilities.description: Burrow underground for stealth and ambush

fruits.name: Sube Sube no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to accelerate or decelerate aging of objects.

abilities.name: Rust Touch
abilities.description: Age objects to rust and decay

fruits.name: Gol Gol no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate gold and turn things into gold.

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Midas Touch - turn anything to gold

fruits.name: Moa Moa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to increase size and speed of objects by up to 100x.

abilities.name: Moa Moa 100x
abilities.description: Increase size and speed of object by 100x

fruits.name: Zuma Zuma no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control plasma.

fruits.name: Raki Raki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to steal and redistribute luck.

fruits.name: Kira Kira no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn body into diamond for ultimate defense.
weaknesses: Cannot move well when fully diamond

fruits.name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Dragon
fruits.description: Allows user to control and manipulate dragons.

fruits.name: Hira Hira no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to make objects ripple and flutter like flags.

fruits.name: Ishi Ishi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to merge with and control stone.

abilities.name: Stone Merge
abilities.description: Merge with stone for defense and attacks

fruits.name: Noko Noko no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to generate and control poisonous spores.

fruits.name: Nepa Nepa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to induce deep sleep and manipulate dreams.

fruits.name: Ami Ami no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to produce nets from their body.

fruits.name: Kopi Kopi no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to copy and store the appearance and abilities of others.

fruits.name: Modo Modo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to rewind time on objects and people.

fruits.name: Jiku Jiku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate space, creating portals and warping distance.

abilities.name: Spatial Slash
abilities.description: Tear space itself to damage enemies

fruits.name: Kusa Kusa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create and control all types of grass and plants.

fruits.name: Tetsu Tetsu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to turn their body into iron, granting extreme defense.

fruits.name: Koe Koe no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate their voice in various ways for attacks and effects.

fruits.name: Kasai Kasai no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to summon and control various natural disasters.

fruits.name: Nui Nui no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to stitch anything together, including people and objects.

abilities.name: Stitch Bind
abilities.description: Stitch enemy to ground or object

fruits.name: Hogo Hogo no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to create various types of shields and barriers.

fruits.name: Kyofu Kyofu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to manipulate and induce fear in others.

fruits.name: Senshi Senshi no Mi
fruits.description: Grants user enhanced combat abilities and weapon mastery.

fruits.name: Ryoku Ryoku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows user to amplify their own or others' physical power.

notes: Paramecia fruits offer the most variety - from body manipulation to environment control
